com.gemstone.gemfire.cache.lucene

Interface LuceneQuery<K,V>


  • @Experimental
public interface LuceneQuery<K,V>
    Provides wrapper object of Lucene's Query object and execute the search.

    Instances of this interface are created using LuceneQueryFactory.create(java.lang.String, java.lang.String, java.lang.String).

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      int getLimit()
      Get limit size setting of current query.
      int getPageSize()
      Get page size setting of current query.
      java.lang.String[] getProjectedFieldNames()
      Get projected fields setting of current query.
      LuceneQueryResults<K,V> search()
      Execute the search and get results.
